#!/bin/bash
# Run tests after editing Go files
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.go$'; then
  echo 'ğŸ§ª Running tests for modified Go files...'
  go test ./... -v
  if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo 'âŒ Tests failed! Please fix the failing tests.'
    exit 1
  else
    echo 'âœ… All tests passed!'
  fi
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Check if we're about to commit
if echo "$CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" | grep -iE '(commit|git commit)' > /dev/null; then
  echo 'ğŸ“‹ Pre-commit checklist:'
  echo '  1. Run tests: go test ./... -v'
  echo '  2. Update README.md if API changed'
  echo '  3. Update CLAUDE.md if process changed'
  echo '  4. Add/update godoc comments'
  echo '  5. Update examples if needed'
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Documentation review reminder after session
echo ''
echo 'ğŸ“ Session Complete - Documentation Review:'
echo '====================================='
echo ''
echo 'Please review if any documentation needs updating:'
echo '  - README.md: New features or API changes?'
echo '  - CLAUDE.md: Development process updates?'
echo '  - Package docs: Godoc comments current?'
echo '  - Examples: Do they reflect the current API?'
echo ''
echo 'Recent files modified:'
find . -name '*.go' -mmin -60 -type f 2>/dev/null | grep -v '.git' | head -10
